data.name: plTitle.Help
data.value: Enter a Title for the Announcment. Depending on the Skin, this title will appear in bold.

data.name: plDescription.Help
data.value: Enter a description of the XYZ45

data.name: plURL.Help
data.value: The Announcment can optionally link to an external URL, a Page within this site or to a File within this site.

data.name: plExpiryDate.Help
data.value: Enter an Expiry Date for the XYZ45. The XYZ45 will no longer display after this date. Good for limited sales or offerings.

data.name: Title.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter A Title For The XYZ45

data.name: Description.ErrorMessage
data.value: You Must Enter A Description Of The XYZ45

data.name: plViewOrder.Help
data.value: Enter the View Order for the XYZ45.

data.name: plSendMethod.Help
data.value: Select the method for this email to be sent.

data.name: SendTo.Text
data.value: TO: One Message Per Email Address ( Personalized )

data.name: SendBCC.Text
data.value: BCC: One Email To Blind Distribution List ( Not Personalized )

data.name: ViewOrder.ErrorMessage
data.value: View order must be an integer value.

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value:
About the XYZ45s Module

The XYZ45s Module produces a list of simple text XYZ45s consisting of a title and brief description. Options include a read more link to a file, page or other site, XYZ45 PublishDate date and expiration date. Link click tracking and logging are also available. XYZ45s are ordered from newest to oldest, unless a view order is specified.

Add an XYZ45

  1. Add an XYZ45s module, or go to an existing XYZ45s module.
  2. Click Add New XYZ45.
  3. At Title, enter a title for the XYZ45.
  4. At Add Date (optional), remove the tick if you do not want the current day and date to be displayed beside the title.
  5. At Description, enter a description of the XYZ45.
  6. At Link Type (optional), select URL, Page or File and then at Link select or enter the required link, page or file.
  7. At Track Number Of Times This Link Is Clicked? (optional), check the box if required.
  8. At Log The User, Date, And Time For Every Link Click (optional), check the box if required.
  9. At ExpiryDate (optional) click Calendar and select the expiry date for the XYZ45.
  10. At View Order (optional), enter the View Order for the XYZ45.
  11. Click Update.
